com.noctarius.snowcast

Class SnowcastSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.noctarius.snowcast.SnowcastSystem

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class SnowcastSystem
extends Object

    The SnowcastSystem class is the entrance point into using snowcast. By providing the passed in HazelcastInstance instance (no matter if it is a Hazelcast embedded node or Hazelcast client) the internal factory will create the appropriate Snowcast instance.

    Creation of the Snowcast instance is fully thread-safe, the creation result is cached and only one instance will be created for the same HazelcastInstance.

    A basic example on how to use the snowcast API to generate IDs will show the following snippet: 

     // Create a HazelcastInstance
 Config config = SnowcastNodeConfigurator.buildSnowcastAwareConfig();
 HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance = Hazelcast.newHazelcastInstance( config );

 // Create or retrieve the snowcast instance
 Snowcast snowcast = SnowcastSystem.snowcast( hazelcastInstance );

 // Define the custom epoch of the following sequencer
 Calendar calendar = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();
 calendar.set( 2014, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0 );
 SnowcastEpoch epoch = SnowcastEpoch.byCalendar( calendar );

 // Create the sequencer
 SnowcastSequencer sequencer = snowcast.createSequencer( "name", epoch );

 // Generate IDs
 while ( true ) {
     long id = sequencer.next();
     System.out.println( id );
 }

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Snowcast snowcast(HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance)
      Creates or retrieves (a cached) Snowcast instance assigned to the passed in HazelcastInstance.
      static Snowcast snowcast(HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance, int backupCount)
      Creates or retrieves (a cached) Snowcast instance assigned to the passed in HazelcastInstance.

    • Method Detail

      • snowcast

        @Nonnull
public static Snowcast snowcast(@Nonnull
                                         HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance)
        Creates or retrieves (a cached) Snowcast instance assigned to the passed in HazelcastInstance. An implicit value of 1 (ONE) will be configured as the backup count for all SnowcastSequencer instances created by the returned Snowcast instance.
        Parameters:
        hazelcastInstance - the HazelcastInstance with link the Snowcast instance to
        Returns:
        a created or cached Snowcast instance, linked to the given HazelcastInstance
        Throws:
        SnowcastException - if creation fails for various reasons

      • snowcast

        @Nonnull
public static Snowcast snowcast(@Nonnull
                                         HazelcastInstance hazelcastInstance,
                                         @Nonnegative @Max(value=32767L)
                                         int backupCount)
        Creates or retrieves (a cached) Snowcast instance assigned to the passed in HazelcastInstance. The defined backupCount will be set as the backup count for all SnowcastSequencer instances created by the returned Snowcast instance.
        Parameters:
        hazelcastInstance - the HazelcastInstance with link the Snowcast instance to
        backupCount - the amount of backups to be stored on other nodes, default is one backup
        Returns:
        a created or cached Snowcast instance, linked to the given HazelcastInstance
        Throws:
        SnowcastException - if creation fails for various reasons
